name: BIOSuper
description:
BIOSuper is a incremental game. The player is the owner of a Superhero company. Using these heroes, the player must help fight crime to gain new heroes, skills, and respect. Save the world, one area at a time.

Features:

  • World expansion - as you grow in power, so does the world
  • Team of hereos - pick and choose favourites from the selection of heroes
  • Unique combat system
  • Multitasking ability - manage your heroes on the ground, while healing others in the lab

BIOSuper Credits:
